author: USA TODAY, Sara M Moniuszko, USA TODAY
title: Chris Cuomo lost 13 pounds in 3 days due to coronavirus: 'You suffer when you have this'
description: CNN anchor Chris Cuomo says he's lost a shocking amount of weight in a short time span while battling the coronavirus: 13 pounds in 3 days.
content:
CNN's Chris Cuomo, brother of New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, revealed that he has COVID-19. He received support online from his peers and colleagues.
USA TODAY
